name: Superior rectus
insertion: superior surface of eyeball posterior to corneoscleral junction

name: Inferior rectus
insertion: inferior surface of eyeball posterior to corneoscleral junction

name: Medial rectus
insertion: medial surface of eyeball posterior to corneoscleral junction

name: Lateral rectus
insertion: lateral surface of eyeball posterior to corneoscleral junction

name: Superior oblique
insertion: superior surface of eyeball beneath superior rectus

name: Inferior oblique
insertion: lateral surface of eyeball deep to lateral rectus

name: Sphincter pupillae
innervation: parasympathetic fibers via oculomotor nerve (CN III)

name: Ciliary muscle
innervation: parasympathetic fibers via oculomotor nerve (CN III)

name: Occipitofrontalis (occipital belly)
origin: highest nuchal line of occipital bone

name: Procerus
action: wrinkles skin over bridge of nose

name: Masseter
insertion: lateral surface of ramus of mandible
innervation: mandibular division of trigeminal nerve (CN V3)

name: Temporalis
innervation: mandibular division of trigeminal nerve (CN V3)

name: Lateral pterygoid
innervation: mandibular division of trigeminal nerve (CN V3)

name: Medial pterygoid
insertion: medial surface of angle of mandible
innervation: mandibular division of trigeminal nerve (CN V3)

name: Sternocleidomastoid
insertion: lateral part of superior nuchal line
action: unilateral contraction rotates head to opposite side

name: Geniohyoid
innervation: cervical nerve C1 via hypoglossal nerve

name: Thyrohyoid
innervation: cervical nerve C1 via hypoglossal nerve

name: Scalenus posterior
origin: transverse processes of lower cervical vertebrae

name: Pectoralis major
insertion: lateral lip of bicipital groove of humerus

name: Pectoralis minor
action: elevates ribs when scapula is fixed

name: Latissimus dorsi
origin: spinous processes of lower six thoracic vertebrae
insertion: floor of bicipital groove of humerus

name: Rhomboid minor
origin: spinous processes of C7 and T1

name: Deltoid
action: flexes and medially rotates arm (anterior fibers)
extends and laterally rotates arm (posterior fibers)

name: Teres major
origin: lower third of lateral border of scapula
insertion: medial lip of bicipital groove of humerus

name: Teres minor
origin: upper two thirds of lateral border of scapula

name: Biceps brachii
origin: long head: supraglenoid tubercle of scapula
short head: coracoid process of scapula
insertion: bicipital aponeurosis into deep fascia of forearm

name: Coracobrachialis
insertion: medial surface of shaft of humerus

name: Brachialis
origin: anterior surface of distal half of humerus

name: Triceps brachii
origin: long head: infraglenoid tubercle of scapula
lateral head: posterior surface of humerus (upper half)
medial head: posterior surface of humerus (lower half)

name: Pronator teres
origin: humeral head: medial epicondyle of humerus
ulnar head: medial border of coronoid process of ulna
insertion: lateral surface of shaft of radius

name: Flexor carpi ulnaris
origin: humeral head: medial epicondyle of humerus
ulnar head: olecranon and posterior border of ulna

name: Flexor digitorum superficialis
origin: humeroulnar head: medial epicondyle of humerus and coronoid process of ulna
radial head: oblique line of radius

name: Flexor digitorum profundus
origin: anterior and medial surface of ulna
action: assists flexion of middle and proximal phalanges

name: Brachioradialis
insertion: base of styloid process of radius

name: Extensor digitorum
insertion: middle and distal phalanges of digits 2-5

name: Anconeus
insertion: lateral surface of olecranon of ulna

name: Supinator
insertion: neck and proximal shaft of radius

name: Abductor pollicis longus
origin: posterior surfaces of radius and ulna

name: Extensor pollicis brevis
insertion: base of proximal phalanx of thumb

name: Extensor pollicis longus
insertion: base of distal phalanx of thumb

name: Palmaris brevis
action: corrugates skin of palm to improve grip

name: Lumbricals
innervation: deep branch of ulnar nerve (3rd and 4th)

name: Abductor pollicis brevis
insertion: base of proximal phalanx of thumb

name: Flexor pollicis brevis
insertion: base of proximal phalanx of thumb

name: Adductor pollicis
insertion: base of proximal phalanx of thumb

name: Abductor digiti minimi
insertion: base of proximal phalanx of little finger

name: Flexor digiti minimi
insertion: base of proximal phalanx of little finger

name: Gluteus maximus
action: assists knee extension via iliotibial tract

name: Gluteus medius
insertion: lateral surface of greater trochanter of femur

name: Gluteus minimus
insertion: anterior surface of greater trochanter of femur

name: Tensor fasciae latae
action: assists knee extension via iliotibial tract

name: Piriformis
insertion: upper border of greater trochanter of femur

name: Obturator internus
insertion: upper border of greater trochanter of femur

name: Gemellus superior
insertion: upper border of greater trochanter of femur

name: Gemellus inferior
insertion: upper border of greater trochanter of femur

name: Iliacus
action: flexes trunk when thigh is fixed

name: Psoas major
origin: bodies and transverse processes of T12-L5 vertebrae
action: flexes trunk when thigh is fixed

name: Pectineus
insertion: upper part of linea aspera of femur

name: Vastus intermedius
origin: anterior and lateral surfaces of femur

name: Gracilis
insertion: medial surface of shaft of tibia

name: Adductor magnus
innervation: tibial portion of sciatic nerve (hamstring portion)

name: Biceps femoris
origin: linea aspera and lateral supracondylar ridge of femur (short head)
innervation: tibial portion of sciatic nerve (long head)
common fibular portion of sciatic nerve (short head)

name: Semitendinosus
insertion: medial surface of shaft of tibia

name: Extensor digitorum longus
insertion: extensor expansions of lateral four toes

name: Extensor hallucis longus
insertion: base of distal phalanx of great toe

name: Extensor digitorum brevis
insertion: extensor tendons of second to fourth toes

name: Fibularis longus
origin: lateral surface of shaft of fibula

name: Fibularis brevis
origin: lateral surface of shaft of fibula

name: Gastrocnemius
origin: area above medial condyle of femur (medial head)
insertion: posterior surface of calcaneus via calcaneal tendon

name: Soleus
insertion: posterior surface of calcaneus via calcaneal tendon
action: provides main propulsive force in walking and running

name: Popliteus
origin: lateral surface of lateral condyle of femur
insertion: posterior surface of tibia above soleal line
action: unlocks knee joint by laterally rotating femur on tibia

name: Flexor digitorum longus
origin: posterior surface of shaft of tibia
insertion: bases of distal phalanges of lateral four toes
action: flexes distal phalanges of lateral four toes

name: Flexor hallucis longus
origin: posterior surface of shaft of fibula
insertion: base of distal phalanx of great toe
action: flexes distal phalanx of great toe

name: Abductor hallucis
insertion: base of proximal phalanx of great toe

name: Flexor digitorum brevis
insertion: middle phalanges of lateral four toes

name: Abductor digiti minimi (foot)
insertion: base of proximal phalanx of fifth toe

name: Quadratus plantae
action: assists flexor digitorum longus in flexing lateral four toes

name: Lumbricals (foot)
insertion: bases of proximal phalanges of lateral four toes

name: Flexor hallucis brevis
insertion: medial side of base of proximal phalanx of great toe
lateral side of base of proximal phalanx of great toe
action: flexes metatarsophalangeal joint of great toe

name: Adductor hallucis
origin: bases of second, third, and fourth metatarsals (oblique head)
insertion: lateral side of base of proximal phalanx of great toe
innervation: deep branch of lateral plantar nerve
action: flexes metatarsophalangeal joint of great toe

name: Flexor digiti minimi brevis (foot)
insertion: lateral side of base of proximal phalanx of fifth toe
action: flexes metatarsophalangeal joint of little toe

name: Plantar interossei (foot)
origin: inferior surfaces of third, fourth, and fifth metatarsals
insertion: medial sides of bases of proximal phalanges of lateral three toes

name: Extensor digitorum brevis (foot)
origin: anterior part of upper surface of calcaneus
insertion: extensor tendons of second, third, and fourth toes

name: Splenius capitis
insertion: lateral third of superior nuchal line
innervation: posterior rami of cervical spinal nerves

name: Splenius cervicis
innervation: posterior rami of cervical spinal nerves

name: Iliocostalis lumborum
origin: spinous processes of lumbar and lower thoracic vertebrae

name: Spinalis capitis
origin: lower cervical and upper thoracic spinous processes

name: Semispinalis thoracis
insertion: spinous processes of upper thoracic and lower cervical vertebrae

name: Levatores costarum
insertion: rib below vertebra of origin near its tubercle
innervation: posterior rami of thoracic spinal nerves

name: Intertransversarii
innervation: posterior and anterior rami of spinal nerves
action: assists lateral flexion of vertebral column

name: Rectus capitis posterior major
insertion: lateral part of occipital bone below inferior nuchal line

name: Rectus capitis posterior minor
insertion: medial part of occipital bone below inferior nuchal line

name: Obliquus capitis superior
insertion: occipital bone between superior and inferior nuchal lines
action: laterally flexes head to same side

name: Innermost intercostals
origin: medial edge of costal groove of rib above
action: acts with internal intercostals to depress ribs

name: Subcostales
origin: internal surface of lower ribs near angle
insertion: internal surface of rib two or three levels below

name: Diaphragm
origin: costal cartilages of lower six ribs

name: Quadratus lumborum
innervation: anterior rami of T12-L4 spinal nerves
